attributes.action: Cange the law that would allow under 21 year olds to earn the same rate of minimum wage as employees above 21.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently there has been a change in leglislation about age discrimination for older workers. However, this has not applied to younger workers. Minimum wage for under 21's is significantly less than minimum wage for employees over 21. Why should a young person doing exactly the same job as an older employee be paid less? This is age discrimination which is currently legal. This should be changed!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
